name: Path Out
description: Path Out is an autobiographical narrative game following the real journey of Abdullah Karam, a young Syrian escaping the civil war in 2014. Abdullah himself comments the game through Youtube-style videos, giving insights into his dramatic travels through Syria's war torn countryside & daily life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 7, Vista Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 845 MB available space
